benchmark_details.name: GenoTEX
benchmark_details.overview: GenoTEX provides a benchmark dataset for the automated analysis of gene expression data focused on gene-trait association problems. It includes analysis code and results, expert-curated annotations, and a standardized analysis pipeline.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To support the evaluation and development of automated methods for gene expression data analysis using LLM-based agents.

data.source: Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) and The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA)

metrics: Area Under Receiver Operating Characteristic curve (AUROC)
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated as described in the methodology section of the paper.
methodology.interpretation: The performance metrics indicate the effectiveness of different automated methods on the benchmark tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: GenoAgent achieved an AUROC score of 0.74, while human expert performance was at 0.89.
methodology.validation: Evaluation through metrics defined for dataset filtering, preprocessing, and statistical analysis.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data is processed to avoid personally identifiable information.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: CC BY 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License)
